Send a query directly to a specific agent.

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Request to query an agent directly.","properties":{"context":{"anyOf":[{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Context"},"conversation_id":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Conversation Id"},"query":{"maxLength":16000,"minLength":1,"title":"Query","type":"string"}},"required":["query"],"title":"AgentQueryRequest","type":"object"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
